channel.title: Why I am not an admin anymore
channel.description:
I have had several people asking me what happened to my admin status so I took my time to explain all of you who wants to know why.
I will speak shortly.
Some of you may have noticed my inactivity lately. I had my high schools final exams and now I have been studying to get in law school (which in Finland is almost impossible ;) ). That doesent sound so harsh. I found little time to do some of my duties here (like reseting reputation points and post counts).
On 9th july I will go to do my compulsory military service. This is the reason why I resigned and why I simple can't be here. In Finland compulsory military service is 27/7 and it will last from 9 months to a year (I most likely will be away for a year) and I won't be able to visit here. Every now and then on weekends I get to come home which is (as you all know) not enough. I thought it would be best to step aside and give my place on staff for someone who can really make a diffrence here.
I will visit here everytime I have a chance and who knows maybe I will make a comeback after a year (I have a good feeling that MITB will be here when I have done my duties for my country).
I wanna thank you all for this time I have been here and on kaitnieks. I have get to known some of you better than others and some of the new users might not even know who I am. Keep this community alive and obey the rules. I am a living example that anyone can become whatever they want (remembers the time when Algas asked a question which was something like "Where can I get OSi for scar?").
I will end this topic by thanking everyone of you who have found this community and decided to be a part of it. You all have made a great choice.
Thank you all (I will not say good bye cause we will see again)
Algas

item.title: Why I am not an admin anymore
item.dc:creator: @haxed haxed
item.description:
@haxed wrote:

[quote=“lothy, post:77, topic:108912”][quote author=Algas link=topic=155848.msg1574931#msg1574931 date=1183779885]

While we’re still on the topic of military, 80% of males in Finland agree to compulsory military service, according to a poll in 2005.

We are patriotic. It is something we are raised for. Compulsory military service is something that two men can talk about wether they are 60 or 21-year old.

Im looking forward to it… Only bad thing is that I have to leave everything behind… Girlfriend, friends, family, moparisthebest.com etc… Its going to be a life changung year.
[/quote]
You’d be better off though if your country got attacked. Australia has a small military, no guns, nothing. We’d be up shit creek if someone invaded (and Japanese submarines did get into Sydney). That is why it is imperative for us to have a prime minister that knows how to please. :p[/quote]
datz cus were uber fale at armiez.
Seriously. If anything ever happened to australia we’d be better off running to Alice springs. The invaders would be scared of taking over a country and having to take care of the aboriginals and probably run off.

Read full topic
item.source: Why I am not an admin anymore

item.title: Why I am not an admin anymore
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Algas, post:71, topic:108912”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=155848.msg1574488#msg1574488 date=1183769328]
While we’re still on the topic of military, 80% of males in Finland agree to compulsory military service, according to a poll in 2005.
[/quote]
We are patriotic. It is something we are raised for. Compulsory military service is something that two men can talk about wether they are 60 or 21-year old.

Im looking forward to it… Only bad thing is that I have to leave everything behind… Girlfriend, friends, family, moparisthebest.com etc… Its going to be a life changung year.[/quote]
You’d be better off though if your country got attacked. Australia has a small military, no guns, nothing. We’d be up shit creek if someone invaded (and Japanese submarines did get into Sydney). That is why it is imperative for us to have a prime minister that knows how to please.

Read full topic
